Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
13.06.2014 JH SCR18961 Added parameter PI.COUNT_LINENO to call og BID019
04.03.2014 GB SCR18953 Extended list of parameters when BID020 is calls
13.03.2014 SH SCR18743 Changed DSQL (2 tasks) to select debtors for verification letters
25.02.2014 GB SCR18743 Extended DEBC selection with "or MARK_VERIFBYMAILALLOWED = Y"
01.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
10.04.2013 GB SCR18089 Changed link to HOFF: HOFF_CODE = CLNT213_OFFICE
17.08.2011 GB SCR16655 Extended condition for selection
09.05.2011 JOH SCR16407 Replaced GB002 by GB902
20.04.2011 GB SCR16395 Removed test at program start
26.05.2008 SH SCR13653 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by CLNT108_ACC_CURR to recalculate
09.09.2007 GB SCR12902 extended select of client to CLNT212_REVERSEFACTORING='N'
14.09.2006 AK SCR10804 extended select of debtors toDEBC_DEBH<>GSET_DEBH_NO(130)
09.06.2006 JJ SCR11427 Added 'A'-argument BID019 call
17.05.2006 SH SCR11281 Fixed bug with test on GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE -
DEBB_DATLASTVERIFLETTER > (365 / CLNT405_VERIFLETTERNUMBER
-- Reserved run number for verification letters (= 999999999)
... first check if it's a restart after system crash, if true then BID019
has to be called for the already existing TB19 rows
.. create verification letters
-- Extended selection criterias in case of GNRL_CODE = NL
-- Sum(INVO_AACTUALH) < 5000, with INVO_INVDATE selection
... or maybe no invoices exists according to selection, then the result is null
-- Sum(INVO_AACTUALH) = 0, with INVO_MARKCODESPEC selection
... or maybe no invoices exists according to selection, then the result is null
After count V.NUMBER number of debtors meeting criteria
If no debtors selected we're done else calculate number of letters to send

ExpSyntax.val: ' and (b.DEBB_DATLASTVERIFPHONE is null or b.DEBB_DATLASTVERIFPHONE <'&''''&DStr ({0,28},'YYYY-MM-DD')&''''&') and c.DEBC_CLIENTDUNNINGCODE <> 1 and c.DEBC_CLIENTDUNNINGCODE <> 2'
'and ((select sum(INVO_AACTUALH) from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/invo where INVO_DEBC_NO = c.DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO_DUEDATE < '&''''&DStr (Date (),'YYYY-MM-DD')&''''&') < 2000'

Trim ({0,25})&' or (select sum(INVO_AACTUALH) from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/invo where INVO_DEBC_NO = c.DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO_DUEDATE < '&''''&DStr (Date (),'YYYY-MM-DD')&''''&') is null)'

Trim ({0,25})&' and ((select sum(INVO_AACTUALH) from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/invo, '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/mark where INVO_DEBC_NO = c.DEBC_NO and MARK_CODE = INVO_MARKCODESPEC and MARK_VERIFICATIONPRINTINV = '&''''&'N'&''''&') = 0'

Trim ({0,25})&' or (select sum(INVO_AACTUALH) from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/invo, '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/mark where INVO_DEBC_NO = c.DEBC_NO and MARK_CODE = INVO_MARKCODESPEC and MARK_VERIFICATIONPRINTINV = '&''''&'N'&''''&') is null)'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(count(*) as decimal (10,0)) from :1/DEBC c join :1/DEBB b on b.DEBB_DEBC_NO = c.DEBC_NO left join :1/MARK on MARK_CODE = c.DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC where c.DEBC_ADMNO = :2 and c.DEBC_CLNTNO = :3 and c.DEBC_VERIFALLOWED <> 'N' and c.DEBC_DUNNINGSTOP <> 'Y' and DEBC_DEBHBUYGROUP = 0 and (DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC = 0 or MARK_VERIFBYMAILALLOWED = 'Y') and c.DEBC_DEBH <> :9 and b.DEBB_DEBC_NO = c.DEBC_NO and b.DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCC > :4 and (b.DEBB_DATLASTVERIFLETTER < ':5' or b.DEBB_DATLASTVERIFLETTER is null) and (b.DEBB_LASTDUNNSENTDATE < ':6' or b.DEBB_LASTDUNNSENTDATE is null) :7 :8 for fetch only

select c.DEBC_NO, b.DEBB_ACTINVAH from :1/DEBC c join :1/DEBB b on b.DEBB_DEBC_NO = c.DEBC_NO left join :1/MARK on MARK_CODE = c.DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC where c.DEBC_ADMNO = :2 and c.DEBC_CLNTNO = :3 and c.DEBC_VERIFALLOWED <> 'N' and c.DEBC_DUNNINGSTOP <> 'Y' and DEBC_DEBHBUYGROUP = 0 and (DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC = 0 or MARK_VERIFBYMAILALLOWED = 'Y') and c.DEBC_DEBH <> :9 and b.DEBB_DEBC_NO = c.DEBC_NO and b.DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCC > :4 and (b.DEBB_DATLASTVERIFLETTER < ':5' or b.DEBB_DATLASTVERIFLETTER is null) and (b.DEBB_LASTDUNNSENTDATE < ':6' or b.DEBB_LASTDUNNSENTDATE is null) :7 :8 order by b.DEBB_DATLASTVERIFLETTER for fetch only with UR optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: -- Get unique TB19_ID for temp table (same logic as implemented in OID400 acc.
to TB19_ID)
-- If GSET_QUANTITY > 0 (GSET_ID = 174) then this value triggers the numer of
verification letters, but all TB19 rows have to be deleted
